DOC.detailed_description: The following gene investigate : - Insertions-/deletions-polymorphism angiotensin-converting enzyme ( ACE-I/D gene polymorphism ; 3 genotype : ACE-II , ACE-ID , ACE-DD ) . - Anti-adhesive extracellular matrix protein Tenascin-C : gene polymorphism rs2104772 The goal study investigate whether genotype correlate 1 ) endurance back muscle , 2 ) comorbidities asthma diabetes 3 ) risk LBP assess LBP-classification tool .
